document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">'Twould </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">ease </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">Butterfly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">Elate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">Bee </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Thou'rt </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">neither </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Neither </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">capacity </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">Blossom, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">rather </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Thy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">moment </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">Bee's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Eternity </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Content </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">fading </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">enough </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Fade </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">unto </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Divinity </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Dying </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Lifetime </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Ample </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">Eye </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">least </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">attention </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">raise </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: 'Twould ease a butterfly
